original_text: Also of the sons of Aaron the priests, which were in the fields of the suburbs of their cities, in every several city, the men that were expressed by name, to give portions to all the males among the priests, and to all that were reckoned by genealogies among the Levites.
korean_text: 각 성읍에서 등록된 사람이 있어 성읍 가까운 들에 사는 아론 자손 제사장들에게도 나눠 주되 제사장들의 모든 남자와 족보에 기록된 레위 사람들에게 나눠 주었더라

sentences.original_text: Also of the sons of Aaron the priests
which were in the fields of the suburbs of their cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 도시 교외의 들판에 거주하는 자들

sentences.original_text: the men that were expressed by name
to give portions to all the males among the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들의 모든 남자에게 몫을 주기 위해

sentences.original_text: and to all that were reckoned by genealogies among the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레위인 중 족보에 기록된 모든 자에게
